title: Out memory problem:
body:
I am getting the following problem:

222 layers, 6.26582e+07 parameters, 6.26582e+07 gradients
     Epoch     Batch         x         y         w         h      conf       cls     total         P         R       nGT        TP        FP        FN      time
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 208, in <module>
    main(opt)
  File "train.py", line 130, in main
    weight=class_weights, epoch=epoch)
  File "/software/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 477, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/home/amalik/OGA/ultralytics/xview-yolov3/models.py", line 221, in forward
    x = module(x)
  File "/software/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 477, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/software/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/container.py", line 91, in forward
    input = module(input)
  File "/software/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 477, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/software/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/activation.py", line 447, in forward
    return F.leaky_relu(input, self.negative_slope, self.inplace)
  File "/software/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py", line 755, in leaky_relu
    return torch._C._nn.leaky_relu(input, negative_slope)
RuntimeError: CUDA error: out of memory


I reduce the batch size to one but still getting it. What other parameters should I look into to solve this problem?
